text: Baroi heç insone sazovor nest, ki Alloh ʙa ū kitoʙ va hukm va pajomʙarī dihad, sipas ʙa mardum ʙigujad: "Ba çoi Alloh ʙandagoni man ʙoşed", ʙalki sazovori pajomʙaron in ast, ki ʙigūjand: "Ba saʙaʙi on ci ta'lim medoded va dars mexonded, ʙandagoni Alloh ʙoşed". (Modome, ki in iʙodat kardan ʙa pajomʙar loiq naʙoşad, pas ʙa heç mardum ʙa tariqi avlo şoista nest)
